grobnercrystals 1.0 documentation
previous | next | index

Usage¶

Installation¶

To use grobnercrystals, first install it using pip:

$  sage --pip install grobnercrystals

The package can then be imported at the beginning of any SageMath script:

import grobnercrystals

Dependencies¶

Details on installing SageMath may be found here.

GCS requires a Macaulay2 installation; details on how to install Macaulay2 may be found here. GCS also requires the Macaulay2 package “gfanInterface”.

GCS also requires numpy for many of its functions:

$ pip install numpy
